en.content: You follow the man around the outcrop. He glances up, then steps between two rocks and vanishes!
Closer inspection reveals a narrow channel leading into the cliff. There is just enough light to see a small, natural chamber within. You will be uncomfortably close to this man if you go inside.

zh.content: 你绕着庄稼地跟随这个男人。他向上看了一眼，往两块岩石之间一迈步，居然消失了！
仔细观察就会发现，有一道狭窄的通道通往悬崖。光线很微弱，刚刚能看清悬崖下有一个自然形成的小山洞。你如果进去，会和这男人很不舒服地贴在一起。
